Class NetworkResource

java.lang.Object
NetworkResource
public class NetworkResource extends Object
Represents a network resource on a given node.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • getOwners

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getOwners()
      Returns:
      HashMap Key: OwnerID, Value: Amount representing who owns what amount of the resource.

    • lock

      public int lock(int amount)
      Locks a specified amount of the resource if it is available, checks if there is enough of the resource and verifies if the requested amount is positive
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of the resource to lock
      Returns:
      the amount of the resource that was successfully locked

    • reserve

      public boolean reserve(String owner, int amount)
      Removes a resource lock and reserves the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      owner - the client that owns the resource
      amount - the amount of the resource to reserve
      Returns:
      true if resource was successfully reserved

    • unlock

      public void unlock(int amount)
      Removes a resource lock
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of the resource to unlock
